item.title: Extracting Events and Their Relations from Texts A Survey on Recent
item.description: Event-centric knowledge graph 挑战： 细粒度 多重关系 事件定义： event mention 完整的事件描述 event trigger 最具有事件发生代表性的词 event argument 关于事件的角色、实体 eg: A number of demonstrators threw stones and empty bottles at Israeli soldiers positioned near a Jewish
